page.title: 15CLUBS FOR CHILDREN
page.content: The children in our area can join in lots of organised activities if they want to. Marching bands or jazz bands have been popular for a long time in the Durham coalfield. Recently people in this area became interested in these bands and have organised their own. The children wear smart, bright uniforms and march with a banner and play tunes on simple instruments. There are lots of competitions to find the best marching band in the whole region and the bands appear at summer fairs and carnivals. There are three different bands in Creswell at the moment. The Creswell Craglanders were the first, followed by the Breakaways. Now the main band is the Red Devils.
